title: Animation Lead Time
content:
The episode in question was actually produced as part of the 1995-96 season, but was held over for a very long time

Permanently at least, since some odd episodes, such as "Bobby Goes Nuts" and even select scenes of certain episodes were digitally animated.

most cartoons were computer-animated by 2000; Ed, Edd & Eddy is one of the few shows that would make the switch over even later, doing so the next year

Buck Strickland: What the hell is MySpace? 

Hank: I think it's a cult.
